original_text: Now Zebah and Zalmunna were in Karkor, and their hosts with them, about fifteen thousand men, all that were left of all the hosts of the children of the east: for there fell an hundred and twenty thousand men that drew sword.
korean_text: 이 때에 세바와 살문나가 갈골에 있는데 동방 사람의 모든 군대 중에 칼 든 자 십이만 명이 죽었고 그 남은 만 오천 명 가량은 그들을 따라와서 거기에 있더라

sentences.original_text: Now Zebah and Zalmunna were in Karkor
all that were left of all the hosts of the children of the east
sentences.korean_translation: 동방 자손의 모든 군대 중 남은 모든 사람이었다

sentences.original_text: for there fell an hundred and twenty thousand men
